rsg.explanation: Double major students can register in either or both RSG’s 101 Week. First Nations, Metis, and Inuits students can register in their program’s RSG and/or the Indigenous Students’ Association 101 Week
rsg.question: With which Recognized Student Government(s) (RSG) did you register for 101 Week?

health.title: Health Information
health.medical: Relevant Medical Restrictions / Limitations / Information (please email documents to internal@uottawaess.ca if necessary):

signature.title: Signature Page
signature.legal: THIS DOCUMENT AFFECTS YOUR LEGAL RIGHTS. YOU MUST READ IT CAREFULLY. IF YOU DO NOT WISH TO WAIVE YOUR LEGAL RIGHTS, DO NOT SIGN THIS DOCUMENT AND DO NOT PARTICIPATE IN THESE ACTIVITIES.
signature.preamble: I, hereinafter referred to as « the Participant », HEREBY AGREE AND ACKNOWLEDGE having read, understood, and agreed to all terms and conditions contained in the following codes, policies, release, wavier, and otherwise of the University of Ottawa Student Union:
read: Waiver, Release and Indemnity for 101 Week
signature.copies: The Participant FURTHER AGREES AND ACKNOWLEDGES that copies of the above-listed documents are available online at {{url}} have been attached to the Signature Page.
signature.agreement: I HAVE READ AND UNDERSTOOD THIS AGREEMENT AND AGREE TO ALL CONDITIONS CONTAINED THEREIN:

parent.title: PARTICIPANT IS UNDER EIGHTEEN (18) YEARS OLD:
parent.agreement: By signing the below, the parent/guardian warrants that they UNDERSTAND AND AGREE to the terms and conditions set out herein.

error.email: Please enter a valid email address
error.futureDate: Date cannot be in the future

form.success: Thank you! Your submission has been received.

signature.errorType: Please upload a valid image file.
signature.errorLength: Signature must be {{max}} characters or fewer.
